class.name: ijs_controllers/CartesianImpedance
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance and filter parameters, as well as the equilibrium pose can be modified online.

class.name: ijs_controllers/JointImpedance
class.description: Impedance control in joint space with feed forward torques (for CMPs)

class.name: ijs_controllers/JointVelocity
class.description: Joint velocity controller with limited error, equivalent to mode 10 on Kuka.
